text: Jerusalemi ran kumapima nemaniza vahe'motagura Ra Anumzamo'a amanage huno nehianki antahiho. Tamagrama knare antahi'zane vahe'ma mani'naku'ma hanuta, Ra Anumzamofo koro hunenteta, Agri agoraga maniho. Tamagri'ma tamazeri fatgoma hania vahera ko huhampri ante'neanki, anazankura antahintahi nehuta anazama huhampri ante'nemofo nanekegura tamagesa anteta antahiho.
